name: #13 Arara Holimion
description:
Arara Holimion

Race: Elf

Subraces and Variants:
Subrace: Sea Elf
Dragonmark Variant: Mark of Shadow

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 315 years
Height: 5'3"
Weight: 108 lbs.
Eyes: Gold
Skin: Deep Green with brown stripes

Gender: Female
Class: Cleric
Divine Domain: Nature Domain
Background: Urban Bounty Hunter
Occupation: Soldier

Trait: I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
Ideal: Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)
Bond: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.
Flaw: I have a "tell" that reveals when I'm lying.

Description:
Appearance: Exceptionally ugly
High Ability: Intelligence-studious, learned, inquisitive
Low Ability: Strength-feeble, scrawny
Talent: Expert dart thrower and rock skipper
Mannerism: Prone to singing, whistling, or humming quietly
Interaction Trait: Curious
Values: Live and let live (Neutral), Loyal to a benefactor, patron, or employer
Flaw or Secret: Arrogance
